conclusion: Analyze the positions and velocities of the waves to determine when they meet.
Wave 1 propagates along the positive x-axis from x = -0.2 m.
Wave 2 propagates along the negative x-axis from x = 1.2 m.
Wave 1 is at x = -0.2 m at t = 0.
Wave 2 is at x = 1.2 m at t = 0.
Distance between the two wave sources is 1.4 m.
Both waves have a speed of 0.4 m/s.
Relative speed of the waves is 0.8 m/s.
Time it takes for the waves to meet is 1.75 s.
